title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles on multimodal entailment up to 2021. These articles cover various aspects of multimodal entailment, including methodologies, datasets, applications, and evaluations

author.literal: **"Visual Question Answering: Datasets, Algorithms, and Challenges"** - Antol, S., Agrawal, A., Lu, J., Mitchell, M., Batra, D., Lawrence Zitnick, C., & Parikh, D.

title: ICCV
While primarily about VQA, this paper lays foundational work relevant to multimodal entailment
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"**
container-title: IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence

title: Provides a comprehensive survey of multimodal machine learning, including entailment tasks
**"Visual Semantic Role Labeling: A Benchmark for Image Understanding"**
CVPR
Discusses visual semantic role labeling, which is closely related to multimodal entailment

author.literal: **"Image-Text Embeddings for Multimodal Entailment"** - Vu, T., Pham, T., Nguyen, T., & Nguyen, A.

title: ACL
Focuses on creating embeddings for multimodal entailment tasks
Learning Cross-Modality Encoder Representations from Transformers"**
EMNLP
Introduces a model for learning cross-modality representations, useful for entailment
**"Visual and Linguistic Knowledge Transfer for Large Scale Semi-supervised Object Detection"**
CVPR
Discusses knowledge transfer between modalities, relevant for entailment tasks
**"Aligning Books and Movies: Towards Story-like Visual Explanations by Watching Movies and Reading Books"**
ICCV
Explores aligning visual and textual narratives, which is pertinent to multimodal entailment

author.literal: **"Multimodal Neural Machine Translation"** - Elliott, D., Frank, S., Sima'an, K., & Specia, L.

title: ACL
Discusses translation across modalities, which involves entailment
**"From Recognition to Cognition: Visual Commonsense Reasoning"**
CVPR
Introduces a dataset and task for visual commonsense reasoning, closely related to entailment

author.literal: **"Image Captioning and Visual Question Answering Based on Attributes and External Knowledge"** - Wu, Q., Wang, P., Shen, C., Dick, A., & van den Hengel, A.

container-title: IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence

title: Discusses the integration of attributes and external knowledge for multimodal tasks
Grounded Question Answering in Images"**
CVPR
Presents a dataset for visual question answering with entailment aspects
**"Learning to Compose Neural Networks for Question Answering"**
NAACL
Discusses compositional models for multimodal question answering
**"Visual Entailment: A Novel Task for Fine-Grained Image Understanding"**
EMNLP
Introduces the task of visual entailment and provides a dataset for it

author.literal: **"Multimodal Fusion for Video Search Reranking"** - Snoek, C. G. M., Worring, M., & Smeulders, A. W. M.

title: Discusses multimodal fusion techniques relevant to entailment
**"Visual-Semantic Alignments for Generating Image Descriptions"**
CVPR
Explores aligning visual and textual data for generating descriptions, which involves entailment
**"Unifying Visual-Semantic Embeddings with Multimodal Neural Language Models"**
NeurIPS
Discusses embeddings that unify visual and semantic information

author.literal: **"Multimodal Transformer for Unaligned Multimodal Language Sequences"** - Tsai, Y. H. H., Bai, S., Liang, P. P., Kolter, J. Z., Morency, L. P., & Salakhutdinov, R.

title: ACL
Introduces a transformer model for unaligned multimodal sequences

author.literal: **"Image-Text Matching Using Attention-Guided Multimodal Neural Machine Translation"** - Huang, H., Wang, Y., & Wang, W.

title: AAAI
Discusses attention mechanisms for image-text matching

author.literal: **"Visual Question Answering as Reading Comprehension"** - Li, Y., & Jia, J.

title: CVPR
Explores VQA from a reading comprehension perspective, relevant to entailment
**"Multimodal Entailment: A Joint Vision-Language Task"**
Proposes a joint vision-language task specifically focusing on multimodal entailment
These articles provide a broad overview of the field and should give you a solid foundation in multimodal entailment research
